title: 1967 Spiltscreen bus for sale - bus no longer for sale

posts.content: I currently have a 1967 spilt screen bus for sale. Blue and white in colour. Full width R/R bed in rear from Volkswares plus they upholsterd it and front seats in blue and cream too match exterior. Safari front Windows. 1300 Engin. With reduction boxes solid bus had bare metal resto over year ago . Originally from California. Tax and mot for year sailed through. Thanks for looking . Price around Â£16850

Sorry couple things not mentioned about m bus it's 11 window walkthrough . It's a blank canvass in rear apart from r+r bed. Genuine reason for sale. Pls feel free txt or phone m on 07856259111. Thanks once again for looking if could put pics on here I would but don't no how but would b willing too txt to anyone interested

sounds great but i am not sure if i would have enough cash to put in the deal, can you send some pics to kfsherrock@btinternet.com and what sort of deal you would want and i will have a look and see what i can come up with
cheers
ken
Hello Ken sorry can't do email but can send via txt. Do have few people interested bloke goin too call tonight so if ok with u I'll let u no outcome and go from there. Thanks for reply
